question: Mission Indradhanush is associated with which of the following activity?
option1: Free fertilizer supply to the cultivators
option4: Ensuring free education to girl child
explanation: Mission Indradhanush is associated with vaccination against preventable diseases i.e. Diphtheria, Whooping Cough, Tetanus, Polio, Measles, Tuberculosis, Hepatitis B, meningitis, pneumonia, Rotavirus, Diarrhea and Japanese Encephalitis. The Central Govt. launched the second phase of Intensified Mission Indradhanush 2.0 at the block level of Uttar Pradesh.
